document_data.name: Nanfoodle Buswilligan
document_data.Abilities: He had a little knowledge of [[illusion]]ism.
document_data.Relations: He was a long-term personal friend of [[Shoudra Stargleam]] and was hired by [[Marchion]] [[Elastul Raurym]] to work his alchemy in Mirabar.
document_data.Description: Nanfoodle was around {{SI|3'5|'"|c}} tall with a long crooked nose. He was bald other than a semicircle of white hair on the back of his head from ear to ear.

History.Legacy: The reincarnated [[Regis]] disguised himself as Nanfoodle during his time in [[Cormyr]] in [[1481 DR]].
